video_prompt: A powerful female warrior stands as her windswept dark hair and tattered fabric flow gently. Her intense expression subtly shifts, eyes piercing. Golden armor dynamically gleams with reflections from dancing flames. Her glowing, superheated longsword pulsates with fiery orange light. In the background, turbulent, smoky clouds churn as embers and sparks drift upwards. A massive, blazing sun-like portal subtly pulsates, sending out light flares. Distant ruins flicker with internal fires. Intense foreground flames dance and embers shift, casting dynamic light across the scene.
image_prompt: A dramatic digital painting of a powerful female warrior. She has windswept black hair, serious dark eyes, and fair skin, wearing gleaming golden plate armor and tattered dark fabric glowing with embers. She holds a luminous fiery longsword in a commanding pose. The background is an apocalyptic, fiery ruined city with a massive blazing sun halo and subtle wing-like flares behind her. The sky is turbulent with smoke and orange fire, with intense foreground flames and rubble. Low-angle, high-contrast, dark fantasy art.
refined_video_prompt: Hair and fabric flow gently. An intense expression subtly shifts, eyes piercing. Armor gleams dynamically with reflections from dancing flames. A longsword pulsates with fiery orange light. In the background, clouds churn turbulently as embers and sparks drift upwards. A portal subtly pulsates, sending out light flares. Distant ruins flicker with internal fires. Foreground flames dance, embers shifting and casting dynamic light.
